/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/speech_recognizer.dir/src/speech_recognizer.cpp.o  -o speech_recognizer -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libpocketsphinx.so /usr/local/lib/libsphinxbase.so /usr/local/lib/libsphinxad.so /usr/local/lib/libYARP_dev.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_name.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_init.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_math.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_sig.so.2.3.68 /usr/local/lib/libYARP_OS.so.2.3.68
